ygData.subject: RE: Suggested monk improvements
ygData.msgSnippet: ON teh subject as the advantages of being a monk: When you consider that we have no research to do, or hard to get itmes to collect, we do VERY competative
ygData.messageBody:
ON teh subject as the advantages of being a monk:

When you consider that we have no research to do, or hard to get itmes to
collect, we do VERY competative levells of damage. I would dare say that
a well equiped monk of level 50 will OUTDAMAGE any warrior or mele class
in a fight - haste sash and what not.

I think we are definitely one of the most damage dealing melee calsses out
there. But we are best because we need NO fancy EQ to do it. A naked monk
is *almost* as deadly as a one fully equipped. This is usefull for corpse
recovery and rescue missions in dungeons. What is a Pallie with no
GHoulbane or soulfire - a snivelling wimp thats what!
